name: Assemble Bot
description:
Assemble Bot. 

You play as “Assemble Bot”, a Robot separated from itself. 

Embark on a journey searching for pieces of yourself lost in a time long ago. Maneuver through traps and tribulations as you discover not only your full power, but what it means to be fully joined together.

Music and SFX by @stevenjohnsound.

Art & Animation by Johny Thomas

Programming and Level Design by Joaquim Schaeverbeke
